source.64183734:
def Plot_graph2021(df,colname=None, title='X distribution of Kaggle Users ',y_label='',shift1=100,shift2=100):
    sns.set_theme(style="darkgrid")

    f, ax = plt.subplots(figsize=(10, 16))


    sns.set_color_codes("pastel")
    sns.barplot(x=df[colname].value_counts().values,
                y=df[colname].value_counts().index,
                label="Percentage of user", color="g",edgecolor='black', linewidth=0.5, saturation = 0.5)

    ax.legend(ncol=2, loc="lower right", frameon=True)
    ax.set( ylabel="",xlabel="User count")
    sns.despine(left=True, bottom=True)
    
    plt.title(title, weight='bold',fontsize=15)
    plt.xlabel("# Users", weight='semibold',fontsize=15)
    plt.ylabel(y_label, weight='semibold',fontsize=15)

    z=df[colname].value_counts().values
    for n, i in enumerate(df[colname].value_counts().index):    
        ax.text(df[colname].value_counts().values[n]+shift1,n,s=f'{round(z[n]/df.shape[0]*100,1)}%,',color='black') 
        ax.text(df[colname].value_counts().values[n]+shift2,n,s=round(z[n],1),color='black')
source.344bca3f:
def Plot_graph2020(df,colname=None, title='X distribution of Kaggle Users',shift1=100,shift2=100,y_label=''):
    sns.set_theme(style="darkgrid")

    f, ax = plt.subplots(figsize=(10, 16))


    sns.set_color_codes("pastel")
    sns.barplot(x=df[colname].value_counts().values,
                y=df[colname].value_counts().index,
                label="Percentage of user", color="brown",edgecolor='black', linewidth=0.5, saturation = 0.5)

    ax.legend(ncol=2, loc="lower right", frameon=True)
    ax.set( ylabel="",xlabel="User count")
    sns.despine(left=True, bottom=True)
    
    plt.title(title, weight='bold',fontsize=15)
    plt.xlabel("# Users", weight='semibold',fontsize=15)
    plt.ylabel(y_label, weight='semibold',fontsize=15)

    z=df[colname].value_counts().values
    for n, i in enumerate(df[colname].value_counts().index):    
        ax.text(df[colname].value_counts().values[n]+shift1,n,s=f'{round(z[n]/df.shape[0]*100,1)}%,',color='black') 
        ax.text(df[colname].value_counts().values[n]+shift2,n,s=f'{round(z[n],1)}',color='black')
source.89261e88:
def plot_donut(df,colname=None, title='X distribution of Kaggle Users ',colors=''):
    plt.figure(figsize=(15,10))
    explode_values = (0, 0, 0.2, 0, 0, 0, 0.2, 0, 0, 0, 0, 0.2,0.2)
    
    circle = plt.Circle((0,0), 0.7, color='white')
    plt.rcParams['text.color'] = 'black'
    
    plt.pie(df[colname].value_counts().values,
        labels=df21[colname].value_counts().index,
        colors=colors,shadow=True,autopct='%.1f%%' )
    
    p = plt.gcf()
    p.gca().add_artist(circle)
    
    plt.title(title, size=20)
    plt.show()

scale =[[0, '#E4C56F'],
             [0.5,'#455C4F'],
             [1.0, '#CF673A']]


settings = [ dict(
        type = 'choropleth',
        autocolorscale = False,
        colorscale = scale,
        showscale = True,
        locations = df21['In which country do you currently reside?'].value_counts().index,
        z = df21['In which country do you currently reside?'].value_counts().values,
        locationmode = 'country names',
        text = df21['In which country do you currently reside?'].value_counts().index,
        marker = dict(
            line = dict(color = '#E4C56F', width = 0.5)),
            colorbar = dict(autotick = True, tickprefix = '', 
            title = 'Participants')
            )
       ]

layout = dict(
    title = 'Number of People Participated in Survey 2021',
    geo = dict(
        showframe = True,
        showocean = True,
        oceancolor = '#1274A1',
        projection = dict(
        type = 'orthographic',
            rotation = dict(
                    lon = 60,
                    lat = 10),
        ),
        lonaxis =  dict(
                showgrid = False,
                gridcolor = '#6e6d6d'
            ),
        lataxis = dict(
                showgrid = False,
                gridcolor = '#6e6d6d'
                )
            ),
        )
fig = dict(data=settings, layout=layout)
py.iplot(fig, validate=False, filename='worldmap')

source.df7eadcc:
Both the above graph📊 shows Kaggle user distribution across differnt countries in year..    
As we can see most user are form India and United States of America.
When we compare both the graph we can make following conclusions:       
  ✔User in India has incresed📈 from less then 5851 in 2020 to 7434 in 2021 but the percentage of users     has decresed form 29.2% to 28.6%( i.e. if in 2020 29.2% of total users were from india by 2021 only 28.6% ).   
  ✔Similar observation is made with respect to USA(11.2% to 10.2%), Others(6.9% to 4.9%),Brazil(3.5% to 2.9%).   
  ✔Similarly increase in percentage can also be observed in Japan(3.2% to 3.5%), China(2.4% to 3.1%), Nigeria(2.4% to 2.7%) etc.   
  ✔Their is also an increase percentage of  users form countries with small number of kaggle users.
